name: Upstart Jobs
overview:
UpstartJobs.com is a jobs website and cloud-based applicant tracking system designed for startup companies and job seekers looking for the excitement and challenges of working in a startup.

Not just another job board, UpstartJobs.com allows startups to find quality candidates and easily manage the entire application process.

Job Posting Management features include:

• Target job seekers looking for a job in a startup • Update job details after posting job • Update company details after posting job • Include company logo in job posting • Include company images in job posting • Include link to company website in job posting • Track the number of job views • Share job posting on social media websites

Job Application Management features include:

• Receive an email notification for each job application • Use UpstartJobs.com to share access to job applications with colleagues • Message job applicants using UpstartJobs.com • Shortlist selected job applications
